name: Lite
roaming_notes: Unlimited Canada-wide calling | Unlimited Canada texting | Speed: Data at up to 250 Mbps | Features: Hotspot capabilities; SD video streaming

name: Select
roaming_notes: Unlimited Canada-wide calling | Unlimited Canada texting | Speed: Data at up to 250 Mbps | Features: Hotspot capabilities; SD video streaming

name: Max
roaming_notes: Unlimited Canada-wide calling and texting | Unlimited minutes for calls from Canada to 27 countries | Speed: Data up to fastest available speed; throttle to 512 Kbps after 200 GB | Features: Hotspot capabilities; Crave Standard With Ads

name: Ultra
roaming_notes: Unlimited Canada-wide calling and texting | Unlimited minutes for calls from Canada to 65 countries | Speed: Data at fastest available speed; throttled to 512 Kbps after 250 GB | Features: Hotspot capabilities; Crave Standard With Ads; Get a tablet or smartwatch with SmartPay and a data plan for that device for $0.

name: Select (2-line)

name: Max (2-line)

name: Ultra (2-line)
